name: Segundo Bairro Goan Restaurant and Bar

reviews.review_text: Fabulous Goan delicacies! If you want to enjoy  Goan culture, this is the place. Loved being there. The owner is too nice. Lovely decor, fantastic food, excellent behaviour and service.

Excellent Goan Cusine !!!

We had a great time And unexpected Service From the Owner. Initially we ordered Mekabo - White Rum with the mixture of Pineapple juice which was very Delicious. We had a kingfish masala Which was so Juicy and Balanced Spices ..
We had Orded Some Chicken cafral goan Best Dish and then Veg xacutti It was too Good ..

Must visit place for Drinks with Lunch and Dinner ..
Very good combination of Cocktails and Mocktails .

Highly recommend....

I recently visited Segundo Bairro Goan Restaurant with high expectations, but unfortunately, my experience was underwhelming. While the ambiance was decent, the service left much to be desired. The staff seemed inattentive and took a long time to take our order and serve the food.
Speaking of food, the flavors were not as authentic as I had hoped for a Goan restaurant. The dishes lacked the rich spices and freshness that one associates with Goan cuisine. The seafood, in particular, did not taste as fresh as it should have.
The portion sizes were small compared to the price, which made the meal feel overpriced for the quality offered. Overall, while the concept of the restaurant is promising, there is significant room for improvement in terms of service, food quality, and value for money.
